name: DropColony(Windows Version)
description:
This is the Windows version of "DropColony", submitted for Indie Teens Jam. To vote, go to the Indie Teens Jam and you will see a submission labeled with a similar title. Yet, here is the story: 

After Soleil gets hit by an asteroid, the planet is no longer capable of holding its inhabitants: A white-cube-like species known as the Droppy. Fortunately, their neighboring planet, Earth, seems to be just as inhabitable for them as their old one. In this fun tycoon game, help the Droppy make a new living on our home planet by providing metals, resources, food, and happiness with the many available construction choices ready to drop based on your resources. Will the aliens be able to create a civilization just like us? Find out in Drop Colony! 

Also, a special shoutout and big thanks to my amazing partners,  TheBlitzzz and rhaskia, for not only creating this project along with me, but also forming the DipSauce, our organization. 

There  links are down here:

https://TheBlitzzz.itch.io/

https://Rhaskia.itch.io/
